00173 bool TArray<Element, Dimensions>::IsEmpty() const
00174 {
00175        return m_sizes.IsSizeEmpty();

00217 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00218 inline const Element& TArray<Element, Dimensions>::GetAt(const IndexType& index) const
00219 {
00220        I_ASSERT(index.IsInside(m_sizes));
00221 
00222        int elementIndex = GetElementIndex(index);
00223        I_ASSERT(elementIndex < int(m_elements.size()));
00224 
00225        return m_elements[elementIndex];

00286 // inline protected methods
00287 
00288 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00289 inline int TArray<Element, Dimensions>::GetElementIndex(const IndexType& index) const
00290 {
00291        int elementIndex = 0;
00292        int cumulatedSizes = 1;
00293        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00294               I_ASSERT(index[i] >= 0);
00295               I_ASSERT(index[i] < m_sizes[i]);
00296 
00297               elementIndex += index[i] * cumulatedSizes;
00298 
00299               cumulatedSizes *= m_sizes[i];
00300        }
00301 
00302        return elementIndex;
00303 }
00304

00308 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00309 TArray<Element, Dimensions>::TArray()
00310 {
00311        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00312               m_sizes[i] = 0;
00313        }
00314 }

00333 template <class Element, int Dimensions>

00360 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00361 void TArray<Element, Dimensions>::UpdateElementsSize()
00362 {
00363        int cumulatedSizes = 1;
00364        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00365               cumulatedSizes *= m_sizes[i];
00366        }
00367 
00368        m_elements.resize(cumulatedSizes);
00369 }

00371 
00372 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00373 void TArray<Element, Dimensions>::DeepCopy(const Elements& elements, const SizesType& sizes)
00374 {
00375        I_ASSERT(int(elements.size()) == sizes[0] * sizes[1]);
00376 
00377        m_elements = elements;
00378        m_sizes = sizes;
00379 }

00397 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00398 const Element& TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator::operator*() const
00399 {
00400        I_ASSERT(m_arrayPtr != NULL);
00401        I_ASSERT(IsInside(m_arrayPtr->GetSizes()));
00402 
00403        return m_arrayPtr->GetAt(*this);

00437 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00438 typename TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator& TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator::operator++()
00439 {
00440        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && !Increase(m_arrayPtr->GetSizes())){
00441               m_arrayPtr = NULL;
00442        }
00443 
00444        return *this;
00445 }

00494 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00495 bool TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator::operator==(const Iterator& iterator) const
00496 {
00497        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && (iterator.m_arrayPtr != NULL)){
00498               return (m_arrayPtr == iterator.m_arrayPtr) && (BaseClass::operator==(iterator));
00499        }
00500 
00501        return (m_arrayPtr == iterator.m_arrayPtr);
00502 }
00503

00512 // protected methods of emedded class Iterator

00514 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00515 TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator::Iterator(TArray* arrayPtr)
00516 :      BaseClass(0), m_arrayPtr(arrayPtr)
00517 {
00518        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && !IsInside(m_arrayPtr->GetSizes())){
00519               m_arrayPtr = NULL;   // if it is not inside of array set it directly to the end iterator state
00520        }
00521 }
